thread.title: Matthew - Wilmington, NC
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Matthew - Wilmington, NC

author: Matthew - Wilmington, NC
title: Matthew - Wilmington, NC
text: Just booked a car f/my trip. It was very easy & the Rentalcars.com site even provided additional information: picture of car, how many bags & people it was rated to carry, .. & the total cost of the rental (which was very much appreciated). Haven't gone on my trip yet but I'm looking forward to being able to get my car w/o any problems.
